title: Top 10 Monsters We Want to See on American Horror Story
author: WatchMojo.com
comment: I feel like a theme for a future AHS season could be “American Horror Story: Urban Legends” that explores boogeyman, Bloody Mary, abominable snowman and more, just an idea
Ahs with theme of small sea town that has lovecraftian themes would be epic
Why AHS is so successful is they have stayed pretty far away from classic horror lore, bringing in only as much as they need to make it feel familiar
I'd live to see q skinwalker in AHS. Do a series incorporating Native American folklore (skinwalkers, Coyote, Raven). That would be amazing.

I'd say a Wendigo would be a really cool monster to have.  They did kinda have that cannibal family in the Roanoke season, but I'd love to see a full-on Wendigo be introduced.  There's so much you could do with something like that.
description:
Top 10 Monsters We Want to See on American Horror Story
Subscribe: http://goo.gl/Q2kKrD and also Ring the Bell to get notified // Have a Top 10 idea? Submit it to us here! http://watchmojo.com/suggest
